original_text: And what great nation is there, that has statutes and rules so righteous as all this law that I set before you today?
korean_text: 오늘 내가 너희에게 선포하는 이 율법과 같이 그 규례와 법도가 공의로운 큰 나라가 어디 있느냐

sentences.original_text: And what great nation is there,
so righteous as all this law
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 내가 너희 앞에 두는 이 모든 율법처럼 의로우며,

sentences.original_text: that I set before you today?
